title: Clipboard on Android get Exception.
body:
#### Issue details

My code: `Gdx.app.getClipboard().getContents();`
Run in libgdx main Thread,My device is Nexus 5 with android 6.0.
#### Reproduction steps/code

Gdx.app.getClipboard().getContents(); 
On android .
